value:
$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|Okay, I get it! So basically we just
have to destroy that vortex? Right?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Correct. I know you had plans to
enjoy the festival, but may I ask for
your assistance in this endeavor?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|Of course! I'll never sit idle and let
people get hurt, no matter who or
what stands in the way of my blade.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|Attagirl! You need muscle, so I'll join!$k$p$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|Look at it spin! Is it gonna go BOOM?$k$p$nMPID_比翼イドゥン|Boom?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|Psh. This task is beneath me... And
these people expect me to fight
alongside that so-called "dragon"?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|So-called?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|A trivial affair like this is a distraction
from ME and my beauty! I am the
true embodiment of spring itself!$k$p$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|C'mon everyone. Let's gooo!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|Gah! D-don't pull me!$k$p

$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|We did it! The vortex is disappearing!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|That's right! Our father-daughter
bond can conquer any hell portal!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Thank you, everyone. We managed to
save this world from destruction.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|I'm so glad. My sisters will be proud!$k$p$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|Bye-bye, whirly-whirl!
Do you think it'll come back?$k$p$nMPID_比翼イドゥン|If it does, then all of us
together will...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|Nonsense!$k$pI will not waste ANY more
of my precious time on such
insignificant matters!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Well, I bid you all farewell. Please,
return to your merry-making.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|Hey, Marth... Do you wanna come
have fun with us?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Me? No, I mustn't...$k$p$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|Let's go play!
Woo-hoo!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|H-hey, no pulling! I concede.$k$p
